page.title: 15LANREATH W.I.IN THE 1980s
page.content: We entered the 1980s with a flourish. We came first in the Cornwall Federation's Baker Cup Competition with our book"The Changing Farm 1900/ 1980".Our average membership has increased to 25.1987 is our 40th year. Some current meetings are "W.R.V.S.in an emergency","Learning to make Pot Pourri", a talk on "Antique Jewellery". Our youngest member makes birthday posies (a custom her grandmother followed for many years). The W.I.has remained a strength in our community-the long running Art classes held weekly in the village hall were started by the W.I.and this September dressmaking classes commence. Rehearsals for a short play are in progress.At Easter we run the refreshment marquee at Lanreath's Easter Vintage Rally.Lanreath W.I.have entered the'Tidy Village'competition.
